content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI generated an image of a beautiful sunset over the ocean. My assistant suggested that I organize my workspace to increase productivity and reduce mistakes. I ran the command to list all files in my workspace. Nothing new happened. I browsed the website https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/River to learn about the characteristics of a river.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Some characteristics of a river include its natural flowing watercourse that usually flows on the surface or inside caves towards another waterbody at a lower elevation, its importance in the water cycle, its crucial ecological functions in providing and feeding freshwater habitats for aquatic and semiaquatic fauna and flora, and its significance to humankind as a vital source of drinking water, food supply, shipping, natural borders, hydropower, and leisure activities. Rivers can be classified based on their topography, biotic status, and navigability, and can have different flows, chemistry, and impacts on their ecosystems. However, the text does not provide a comprehensive list of characteristics of a river. \n \n Links: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/River#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "river_simulation.py", "text": "# This script simulates the behavior of a river\\n\\nimport time\\n\\nwhile True:\\n    print(\'The river is flowing...\')\\n    time.sleep(1)\\n"}}}'}]
"""
